trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_SEQ_00<tab>Osment at Crescent Cove is vexed by litter in the area.
TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_SEQ_01<tab>A merchant from Limsa Lominsa has left rubbish scattered about the docks. Clean it up as a service to the distressed Osment.
TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_SEQ_02<tab>You have finished cleaning up the rubbish that littered the docks. Speak to Osment once more.
TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_SEQ_03<tab>Though cleanliness has been restored, Osment is already lamenting the next Lominsan sloth who will darken his docks.
TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_TODO_00<tab>Clean up the rubbish on the docks.
TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_OSMENT_000<tab>Ugggh, what a pain in the bloody arse. Who do those Lominsans think they are, anyway?
TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_OSMENT_001<tab>Just look at all this, would you? A merchant from Limsa Lominsa dumped this junk when he shipped out. Claimed it wasn't fit for sellin', so he just up and left it!
TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_OSMENT_002<tab>Barbarians! What passes for etiquette across the Strait of Merlthor?
TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_OSMENT_003<tab>Don't suppose I could ask you to clean up the rest for me, eh? Please? I've picked up so much junk already, the mere sight of it fair makes me gag.
TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_OSMENT_010<tab>Thank you, friend. Seeing this place clean again does my spirit good.
TEXT_SUBWIL093_00342_OSMENT_011<tab>Though, I suppose some other Lominsan merchant will be by before long and leave more filth behind. <sigh> I hate my life.
